scripts.postinstall: npm run clean && npm-run-all install-server install-client
scripts.client-ci: cd client && npm run build && npm run deploy-ci
scripts.garba-cart: npm run normaGBJob && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.compu-cart: npm run normaCMJob && npm-run-all --parallel client server-dev
scripts.start-ci: npm run normaGBJob && npm-run-all --parallel client-ci server-ci
